archimate:TechnologyCollaboration.name: Approach Lighting
archimate:TechnologyCollaboration.documentation: The lights installed usually on the boundary of the airport on the ends of a runway that aids pilots in aligning their plane with the runway. Lights in this category include the Precision Approach Path Indicators (PAPI), Runway End Identifier Lights (REIL) and Medium Approach Light System with Runway Alignment Indicator Lights (MALSR).
